name: Balefire Charger
description: Charges up and releases bolts of Balefire.

languages.description: Lade verheerende Freudenfeuerbolzen auf und feuere sie ab.
languages.name: Freudenfeuerladung

languages.description: Charge et relâche des fragments Incandescents.
languages.name: Chargeur Incandescent

languages.description: Carica e rilascia dardi della Balefire.
languages.name: Balefire Charger

languages.description: Carga y lanza clavos del Balefire.
languages.name: Cargador Balefire

languages.description: 蓄力并放出闪电般的野火。
languages.name: 野火充能

languages.description: Подготавливает и выпускает заряды Погребального Огня.
languages.name: Зарядник Погребального Огня

languages.description: Balefireの矢をチャージして解き放つ。
languages.name: Balefire Charger

languages.description: 蓄力並發出野火般的閃電。
languages.name: 野火充能

languages.description: ชาร์จและปล่อยกระแสไฟฟ้าของ Balefire ออกมา
languages.name: Balefire Charger
